channel.title: Geodata on Christian Mahnke
channel.description: Recent content in Geodata on Christian Mahnke

item.title: "Patching" OpenStreetMap data
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: “Counterfactual architecture” yields almost no results on Google (at least in German)….

item.title: Mapproxy als WMS Downloader
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: Sometimes you need map tiles from a WMS server…

item.title: Quantum cosmos Göttingen
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: Today (26 March) is the opening of the exhibition ‘Was zum Quant?!’ in the Forum Wissen. You can also see a digital exhibit in which I was involved…

item.title: Climate change in art...
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: …is “old news” by now: Neither when it comes to the effects that can be recognised in old works, nor as an object of art itself.

item.title: Build vector maps with GitHub
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: Since the use of freely available map services requires communication with external services as well as limited design, it was time for something of my own…

item.title: GeoIP Tool
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: Kibana visualisation with room plans needs data, e.g. from devices in a building. But the data has to come from somewhere…
